title: Looking for My Fiancé’s Lover - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty
author: Park Gwi-ri   박귀리
description:
During my engagement procedure with Nezar, the crown prince of the Caval Empire, I remember my past life as a seventeen-year-old girl.

I cried and clung to Nezar even though he didn’t like me or wanted the engagement.

Since I do not want to spend my later years with him feeling unloved and left alone, I have no choice but to find a lover for him so that I can break off the engagement!

It’s the only way!

So why does it keep going in a weird direction?

“Bring the man you like in front of me. I won’t accept you running away. I’ll go all the way to the end of the continent and find you until my blood runs dry.”>
